references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the state-of-the-art performance of diffusion models on image synthesis, surpassing previous generative adversarial network (GAN) methods.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for score-based generative models using stochastic differential equations, and it has had significant impact on various downstream applications.

This paper introduces the concept of consistency models which directly predict the solution of the probability flow ODE and achieve fast sampling in diffusion models, which is a significant development of this paper.

This paper introduces denoising diffusion bridge models (DDBMs), which are a new formulation of generative modeling that builds stochastic processes between fixed data endpoints and achieves improved performance on coupled data distribution tasks.
